text.0: this agni is the lord of great felicity and hero strength.
text.1: lord of wealth in herds of kine lord of the battles with the foe.
text.2: wait maruts heroes upon him the prosperer in whom is blissincreasing wealth.
text.3: who in fights ever conquer evilhearted men who overcome the enemy.
text.4: as such o agni deal us wealth and hero might o bounteous one.
text.5: most lofty very glorious rich in progeny free from disease and full of power.
text.6: he who made all that lives who passes all in might who orders service to the gods.
text.7: he works among the gods he works in hero strength yea also in the praise of men.
text.8: give us not up to indigence agni nor want of hero sons.
text.9: nor son of strength to lack of cattle nor to blame drive thou our enemies away.
text.10: help us to strength blest agni rich in progeny abundant in our sacrifice.
text.11: flood us with riches yet more plenteous bringing weal with high renown most glorious one.
